data.text:
Amazing experience. The resort is incredible and staff have been fantastic in particular the legend Burak and Sadri.

Great location, food and facilities. Literally has everything you need for a great vacation.

Thank you and can’t wait to be back soon.
data.title: Amazing resort - facilities, food and staff are incredible

data.text: We had a great time at Lara Barut. The rooms, pool and amenities were top class. Food was excellent with good veg/vegan options and amazing desserts. Very good entertainment and activities for both adults and kids. Highly recommend and would come back some day !
data.title: Wonderful time at Lara Barut !

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear P N,

Thank you for your fantastic review. We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful time at Lara Barut Collection. It's fantastic to know that you found our rooms, pool, and amenities to be top class, and that you enjoyed the excellent food with good options for vegetarians and vegans, as well as our amazing desserts.

We're thrilled that you appreciated the entertainment and activities available for both adults and kids. Providing a diverse range of experiences for our guests is important to us, and we're glad that you found something to enjoy during your stay.

Thank you for your recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back someday for another fantastic experience.

Warm regards,
Didem Özküçük / Guest Relations Manager
owner_response.author: Barut Hotels

data.text: Before we arrived we couldn’t believe how many wonderful reviews this hotel had been given.  Over the past 15 days my husband and I have discovered that the Lara Barut Collection Hotel deserves every single one of the thousands of compliments it has been given.  Every single department and member of staff have provided us with a 5 star experience.  From the moment we arrived into the immaculate grounds of this amazing complex we have been incredibly impressed with the high standards throughout.  Thank you for making my 50th birthday so special. if you’re thinking about booking just do it.
data.title: If I could rate the hotel 6 stars I would.. fantastic experience from start to end

user_location.name: Newcastle upon Tyne, Tyne and Wear, England

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear MReyn02,

Thank you for your glowing review. We are thrilled to hear that you had a fantastic experience at Lara Barut Collection Hotel and that we were able to exceed your expectations from start to finish. It's wonderful to know that you found our hotel to be deserving of the numerous compliments it has received.

We take great pride in providing a five star experience to all our guests, and we're delighted that every department and member of our staff contributed to making your stay memorable. Your kind words about our immaculate grounds and high standards throughout the complex mean a lot to us.

We are honored to have been a part of your 50th birthday celebration, and we're thrilled that we could make it special for you. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we appreciate your recommendation to others.

We look forward to welcoming you back for another fantastic stay in the future.

Warm regards,
Didem Özküçük / Guest Relations Manager
owner_response.author: Barut Hotels

data.text: I think this is the best hotel we have ever stayed in. The cleanliness and attention from staff is second to none. Amazing place. The rooms are spacious. Everywhere is spotless. The range of food and drinks on offer is vast. Various a la carte restaurants to choose from. Excellent entertainment and animation team.
data.title: Be prepared to be pampered

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your wonderful review. We're thrilled to hear that your stay with us exceeded your expectations and that you consider us the best hotel you've ever stayed in.

Maintaining a high level of cleanliness and providing attentive service is our top priority, so we're delighted that you found our staff to be second to none and that you enjoyed the spacious rooms and spotless facilities.

We're also pleased to hear that you enjoyed the vast range of food and drinks on offer, as well as our various a la carte restaurants. Providing excellent entertainment and a dynamic animation team is important to us, and we're glad that you appreciated their efforts.

Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to pampering you again on your next visit.

Warm regards,
Didem Özküçük / Guest Relations Manager
owner_response.author: Barut Hotels

data.text: Wonderful hotel.  Amenities fantastic, cleanliness excellent and plenty of activities to do if you so wish - yoga, Zumba, Pilates, kids clubs.  Tennis courts are in a fantastic condition with towels & cooled water supplied.  Beach Club has a wonderful vibe.  My only criticism was the lack of vegetarian options but other than that food was great.  Just be aware to book A La Carte restaurants as soon as you get there on the App as they book out quickly.
data.title: Great holiday

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Katie,

Thank you for your fantastic review. We're thrilled to hear that you had a wonderful holiday at our hotel and that you enjoyed the fantastic amenities, excellent cleanliness, and abundance of activities available.

We're delighted that you found our tennis courts in fantastic condition and appreciated the complimentary towels and cooled water provided. It's great to know that you enjoyed the wonderful vibe at our Beach Club.

We appreciate your feedback regarding the vegetarian options, and we will certainly take this into consideration for future menu planning. 

Thank you for choosing our hotel for your holiday, and we hope to welcome you back again soon for another memorable stay.

Warm regards,
Didem Özküçük / Guest Relations Manager
owner_response.author: Barut Hotels
